channel.title: CVE Feed for mardojai -- Simple Alert Boxes
channel.description: The latest CVEs for mardojai -- Simple Alert Boxes

item.title: CVE-2024-5937|2024-07-09T14:41:39.452Z -- mardojai -- simple%20alert%20boxes
item.description: The Simple Alert Boxes plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Stored Cross-Site Scripting via the plugin's Alert shortcode in all versions up to, and including, 1.4.0 due to insufficient input sanitization and output escaping on user supplied attributes. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with contributor-level access and above, to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that will execute whenever a user accesses an injected page.
